title: Nadine Mulkerrin introduces baby to Hollyoaks co-star after breastfeeding advice

Nadine Mulkerrin has introduced her baby boy to Hollyoaks co-star Jennifer Metcalfe after turning to her for breastfeeding advice.

The actress, who plays Cleo McQueen in the Channel 4 soap, recently welcomed her first child, Reggie, with boyfriend Rory Douglas-Speed, who plays Joel Dexter in the show.

Nadine reached out to Jen, who plays Mercedes McQueen, in the days after giving birth, and now, the whole gang has finally met.

Jen and her boyfriend, former Geordie Shore star Greg Lake, who share son Daye, headed to Nadine and Rory's to meet their new bundle of joy.

The couple posed up together on the sofa with Greg holding little Reggie in his arms.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Nadine captioned the sweet snap: "I cuddled @greglake_ & @missjenjomet today!!"

In a second picture, Jen holds Reggie while Greg holds Daye who glances down at the baby.

Nadine captioned it: "And my dinosaur friend Daye Lake"

The star previously revealed how she'd reached out to her co-star for breastfeeding advice just days after giving birth.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Sharing a screenshot of a conversation they had on WhatsApp, she said: "Day 1 - smug m****rf****r this is world most chilled well behaved silent sleepy content baby.

"Day 2 Will this ever end. Why won't you go back in your f*****g bed.

"I've tried tricking him like 18 times just wants to lie on my nipple in his throat sleeping. Cheers bud."

(Image: Instagram)

After their baby was born, Nadine revealed that she made Rory drive home at 5mph.

Taking to Instagram to share their journey, she said: "We’ve Left! I cried all the way home and made Rory drive 5mph.

"What a terrifying moment being left responsible with the most precious thing ever! Feeling very teary and told nearly everyone in the hospital they were an angel. (Not the drugs talking)

"Thank you all for your gorgeous messages!

"P.s Yorkshire anthems will not be withheld from this child!"
